content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ricston Limited whose principal office is at 33, Triq G.F. Agius De Soldanis, Birkirkara, BKR 4850 (“Ricston”) is committed to protecting the privacy and security of your personal information.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This privacy notice describes how we collect and use personal information about you when you are providing services to Ricston, in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation 2016 (“GDPR”).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You are receiving this privacy notice because you will be providing services to Ricston as an independent contractor. This is separate to any privacy notice you have already received about any recruitment or application process and the general privacy notice for general use of our corporate websites.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We may update this notice at any time. We will notify applicants of substantial changes to the privacy notice and will obtain your consent if and where this is required by law.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ricston is a \\\"data controller\\\". This means that we are responsible for deciding how we hold and use personal information about you.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We are required under data protection legislation to notify you of the information contained in this privacy notice. It is important that you read this notice so that you are aware of how and why we use your personal data.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
